snippets.__html: html[xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en" xml:lang="en" style="width: 100%; min-width: 100%; Margin: 0; padding: 0;"]
snippets.__meta:format-detection: meta[name="format-detection" content="telephone=no, address=no, email=no, date=no, url=no"]/
snippets.__meta:author: meta[name="author" content="Fabrice Sanga"]/
snippets.mtb: ${1}
snippets.mtb:f: ${1}
snippets.mtb:ie: ${1}
snippets.mtb:ief: ${1}
snippets.__mtb:9: ${1}
snippets.__mtb:9f: ${1}
snippets.__mtb:9ie: ${1}
snippets.__mtb:9ief: ${1}
snippets.__mso:body: ${1}
snippets.__mso:email-container: ${1}
snippets.head: head>meta+title{HTML Email}+__style:css-reset
snippets.body: body[width="100%" style="min-width: 100%; Margin: 0; padding: 0; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #FCFCFC;"]
snippets.center: center[role="article" aria-roledescription="email" lang="en" style="width: 100%; padding-bottom: 10px; background-color: #FCFCFC;"]
snippets.div:preheader: (div[aria-hidden="true" style="display: none; max-height: 0; overflow: hidden; mso-hide: all;"]>{${1:Add preheader text here (85-100 characters in length)}})+div[style="display: none; font-size: 1px; line-height: 1px; max-height: 0px; max-width: 0px; opacity: 0; overflow: hidden; mso-hide: all; font-family: sans-serif;"]{‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ }
snippets.table:fxd: table[align="center" role="presentation" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 600px; border-width: 0; border-spacing: 0; border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; Margin: 0 auto;"]
snippets.table:fld: table[align="center" role="presentation" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; border-width: 0; border-spacing: 0; border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; Margin: 0 auto;"]
snippets.table:hyb: table[align="center" role="presentation" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; min-width: 480px; max-width: 600px; border-width: 0; border-spacing: 0; border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; Margin: 0 auto;"]
snippets.td: td[align="left" valign="top" style="width: 600px; text-align: left; vertical-align: top; padding: 0;"]
snippets.img: img[src="${1:https://via.placeholder.com/400x100}" alt="" title="" width="200" height"50" border="0" style="width: 200px; height: 50px; display: inline-block; outline: none; border-width: 0; line-height: 100%; text-decoration: none; -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;"]/
snippets.a: a[href="${1:http://example.com/}" target="_blank" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: none; text-underline: none;"]
snippets.div:stack-column: .stack-column[style="width: 100%; min-width: 480px; max-width: 600px; display: inline-block; Margin: 0 -1px; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;"]
